Pre-Game Insights: United States of America is set to face Bangladesh in the 1st T20I of the Bangladesh tour of United States of America 2024 at the Prairie View Cricket Complex on May 21.
The USA recently demonstrated their growing prowess in the T20 format by hosting Canada for a 5-match series, where they achieved an impressive 4-0 victory.
Bangladesh arrives in the USA following a successful T20I series against Zimbabwe, held on their home ground, where they secured a commanding 4-1 series win.
Except for Taskin Ahmed, who is out due to an injury from the T20Is against Zimbabwe, Bangladesh has no new injuries to report. Hasan Mahmud has been brought in as his replacement.
